keyPolicies.policyTitle: Higher education: Fair for all, abolishing fees
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will abolish tuition fees for all undergraduate students.
Labour will nationalise key industries to benefit everyone.
Labour will provide free primary school meals for all children.

issues.economy: Labour will guarantee the state pension "triple lock" ensuring that pensions rise by 2.5%, the rate of inflation or average earnings.
issues.education: Labour will abolish tuition fees for all undergraduate students.
issues.environment: Air quality is a major concern for people in our area but the Conservative Party is still dragging their heels over a proper national plan to get rid of illegal levels of air pollution.
issues.health: Our NHS is going backwards, not forwards.
issues.transport: Labour will nationalise key industries like rail which have been letting services suffer.
issues.socialWelfare: Reversing the cuts to NHS and social care.

community.content: He has worked thousands of local people and have strong track record in helping people in the constituency.
Our local area people are feeling the pinch more than ever before.

leaflet.personalStatement: I lead the councillors in opposition to the closure for a public consultation.

politicalExperience.achievements: He has worked thousands of local people and have strong track record in helping people in the constituency.

contactInformation.address: FREPOST RTLJ-EKSL-ESKL, Philip Coyne Labour Rooms, North Street, Otley, LS21 1EZ

endorsements.endorsement: Voting Alex because Labour will try to reverse the cuts to the services.
I'm voting for Alex because he will champion the needs for our children.
